page.title: 13INDUSTRY
page.content: The main industry in the area is {coal-mining}there are many pits around Wath and Brampton.One of the main pits is Cortonwood.As a child described the Cortonwood mine,"I found it dusty and horrible.We visited the rescue room and the medical room.We then went into the explosive room after we had been searched for cigarettes and matches.We also saw the winding gear.The wheel bringing up the coal went twice as fast as the one bringing up the men." Mining in the area is now on the decline,with alot of the seams being worked out.A large coking plant to the east of Wath was closed down a few years ago-which hsan't helped the coal industry in the area.
